allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(schema\): add conversation state and author type enums

Add whatsappConversationStateEnum for tracking WhatsApp conversation
flow states \(idle, awaiting_email, awaiting_otp, awaiting_property,
awaiting_description, awaiting_photos, incident_active, and
awaiting_closure_confirmation\).

Add incidentAuthorTypeEnum for tracking who made comments on incidents
\(tenant, agent, landlord, system\).

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bereketmac/RENTAL_AGENT_AI commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(api\): add conversation processing endpoint

Add API route for processing WhatsApp messages through the conversation
state machine. This endpoint is called by the Baileys server for all
incoming messages and handles tenant identification, verification, and
incident creation flows.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bereketmac/RENTAL_AGENT_AI commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add PropNxt landing page rebrand design

Design document for updating the marketing landing page to reflect
actual product capabilities and AI-first positioning. Includes new
hero messaging, 4-category feature organization, vision section,
and beta CTA strategy.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/bereketmac/RENTAL_AGENT_AI commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add PropNxt landing page implementation plan

Detailed 8-task implementation plan for landing page rebrand:
- Hero section with beta badge and AI-first messaging
- Features reorganized into 4 categories \(18 active features\)
- New coming soon and vision sections
